title: Setup Component Test Generator Schema
description: Creates cypress component test files for a given project

projectName.description: The name of the project the component test files will be added to
projectName.x-prompt: What is the project anme that you want to add the component test files to?

componentName.description: The name of the component, e.g. test-example.component.ts, would be TestExample or test-example
componentName.x-prompt: What is the component anme that you want to add the component test files to?

selector.description: The selector used by the component
selector.x-prompt: What is the selector used by the component?

mountType.description: The mount type to use for the component test

x-prompt.message: Which mount type would you like to use for the component test?

items.label: component - mount the component class directly
story - mounting the component using a storybook story
